response.overview: Lilly Bell is upset today, her boss is making her go in on a Saturday which is bad enough, but she is also having major problems with her husband. Her boss can clearly see that she's upset so she lays it all out, her husband never fucks her anymore because he's too busy looking at porn. What's a nice boss to do in a situation like this? Give her the good fucking she needs of course! He dicks her down in ways her husband could NEVER, this should give her good job security and maybe a raise!
response.title: Office Affairs 2
